text: Eva Loweová-Orvošová (born 18 January 1971) is a mountain bike rider and road cyclist from Slovakia. She represented her nation at the 1996 Summer Olympics on the road in the women's road race and on the mountain bike in the women's cross-country. ==References== ==External links== * profile at sports- reference.com Category:Slovak female cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Slovakia Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Liptovský Mikuláš Category:1971 births
title: Eva Orvošová
